description:
Check notifications in your profile on Linux.org.ru.

You can click on a button with L.O.R.'s good penguin in add-on toolbar or use "Ctrl+Space" ("Command+Space" on macOS) keyboard shortcut to check notifications.
Also "Ctrl+Shift+Space" ("Command+Shift+Space" on macOs) shortcut will create a new tab and open L.O.R.
name: L.O.R. Notifications Checker

open-lor-notifications.description: Open "Notifications" on L.O.R. in a new tab via keyboard shortcut
